messages.content: Thank you for calling Nestlé customer service. My name is Davinci. May I have your name, please?
Hi Hannah, thank you for providing your name. How can I assist you today?
I am really frustrated with your service. I've been trying to get some help with Purina Pro Plan, but no one seems to care.
I'm sorry to hear that, Hannah. I assure you I'm here to help. Can you tell me more about the issue you're experiencing with Purina Pro Plan?
The product quality has really gone down. My dog has been having issues ever since we started this new batch. I need this resolved quickly.
I understand your concern, Hannah. Let's get to the bottom of this. Could you please provide me with the batch number and the specific issues your dog is experiencing?
The batch number is 67890XYZ. My dog has been having stomach problems and seems to be losing interest in the food.

Thank you for providing the details, Hannah. I will escalate this issue to our quality control team immediately. In the meantime, I would recommend discontinuing use of this batch. We can arrange for a replacement or a refund. Which would you prefer?
I want a refund. I've already switched to a different brand because of this problem.
I understand, Hannah. I'll process your refund right away. You should see the refund in your account within 7-10 business days. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
No, just make sure the refund is processed quickly. I've had enough of this.
I assure you it will be handled promptly. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Hannah. We appreciate your feedback and apologize for the inconvenience.
